resources: Skip By: Jacob, Dayne, Goeun, and Sparsh Find daFruit START SCORES OPTIONS HELP FRUITS VEGES OPTION MUST BE SELECTED TO SET SET Rules YOU DID IT :D MAYBE NEXT TIME :O ADD CANCEL MENU NICKNAME Welcome to Find daMatch! There is a deck with 7 cards and each card has 3 images on it. The top card is placed face up separately in the discard pile and you must match an image on a card in the main pile with one in the discard pile while being times. The card is then put in the discard pile and this repeats until no cards are left and the timer stops. >>>>>>> app/src/main/res/values/strings.xml
